1.title: Franklin County
1.plot: Day 1 of the Pickin' Up Tennessee tour begins in Franklin County. Join the Porfiri family as they visit the Cumberland Plateau, Cowan Railroad Park, and the Franklin County Jail. After a visit to Falls Mill, the tour got to hear a great traditional pickin' performance in Tims Ford State Park.

2.title: Wilson and Davidson Counties
2.plot: The Pickin' Up Tennessee Tour continues in Wilson and Davidson county. Follow the Porfiri family as they listen to Churchyard perform at Fond Object and help at a litter cleanup in the Shutes Branch Recreation Area. Be sure not to miss Pickin' Up Tennessee's mission, in Jane and Harlan's own words!

3.title: Dickson and Cheatham Counties
3.plot: Day 3 of the Pickin' Up Tennessee tour takes us to Dickinson and Cheatham counties, where the team cleans up part of highway 48, meets the Dickson county mayor Bob Rial, and hear a wonderful rendition of "Angelina Baker" at Fiddle & Pick!

4.title: Hickman and Lewis Counties
4.plot: Hickman and Lewis counties are center stage on Day 4 of the Pickin' Up Tennessee tour! Meet the hilarious band the Litter Pickers, watch the team join a group of inmates clean up Missionary Ridge Road, and visit the Hickman County Solid Waste Facility!

5.title: Lawrence and Marshal Counties
5.plot: Pickin' Up Tennessee heads to Lawrence and Marshall counties for Day 5 of the tour! Check out the Old Jail Museum, Marshall County's Solid Waste Facility, and meet Marshall COunty's Mayor Joe Boyd Liggett! Don't miss a performance by the Denton Family!

6.title: Chester and Hardin Counties
6.plot: Day 6 of the Pickin' Up Tennessee tour takes place in Chester and Hardin counties, with a performance by the Holt family! See the team visit Cherry Mansion in Savannah, Tennessee and talk with Scenic Tennessee President Marge Davis about the value of recycling.

7.title: Shelby County
7.plot:

imdb.plot outline: Pickin' Up Tennessee is a multimedia grassroots project launched in March 2013 by the nonprofit group Scenic Tennessee. Made possible by a generous grant from the Tennessee Department of Transportation with funding from the state's beverage industries, this project seeks to combine the new-age power of digital and social media with the timeless legacies of Tennessee music, volunteerism and stunning beauty, and use the results to vanquish, or at least subdue, the persistent problem of Tennessee's litter.
imdb.title: Pickin' Up Tennessee
plot: _Pickin' Up Tennessee_ (qv) is a multimedia grassroots project launched in March 2013 by the nonprofit group Scenic Tennessee. Made possible by a generous grant from the Tennessee Department of Transportation with funding from the state's beverage industries, this project seeks to combine the new-age power of digital and social media with the timeless legacies of Tennessee music, volunteerism and stunning beauty, and use the results to vanquish, or at least subdue, the persistent problem of Tennessee's litter.::_Pickin' Up Tennessee_ (qv)
